Text:
Uploading the same thing over and over again is no good.

Besides it, the HD is probably just 720p or inferior seeing the size of the files.

All 04 eps 1080p HD = 838MB

Ok, so should I just upload the single episodes as they're out then?

Or just wait until the series is done?
i would wait til the series is out then upload as one package and make sure they're 1080p.
Alright, I'll just wait for the season to end then, as far as I know, 720 is as good as it comes here.
